citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The licensee was unable to locate any records during inspection. Missing records included the Program of Veterinary
Care, acquisition forms, inventory records, disposition forms, and a contingency plan. Not being able to locate the records
doesn't allow for APHIS officials to ensure that veterinary care is being provided as per the directives in the Program of
Veterinary Care, doesn't allow for APHIS officials to properly track animals going through the licensee's facility, and
doesn't allow APHIS officials to ensure a proper emergency management plan is in place. The licensee must be able to
locate and provide all required records to APHIS officials during future inspections. Correct by 11/12/23.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n
